author: giorgio
post: Has Father Filas’ work ever been examined by “outside the circle” of Sindologist? wouldn’t it have been more logical to hand off Fr. Filas’ prints and negatives to an impartial film manufacture that already has countless of film data and specs for each films Father Filas used?.
title: The Forger and the Coins:  One in a Gazillion with 13 Zeroes
